de.entwicklerpages.java.portscanner

Class ScanThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • de.entwicklerpages.java.portscanner.ScanThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ScanThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Thread class for port scanning. This class execute the portscan for the given port range.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nicolas Hollmann

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScanThread

        public ScanThread(java.lang.String host,
          int pStart,
          int pEnd,
          int timeout,
          boolean outputClosed)
        The constructor.
        Parameters:
        host - Host name (f.E. 127.0.0.1 or localhost)
        pStart - Start port (f.E. 20)
        pEnd - End port (f.E. 80)
        timeout - Connection timeout
        outputClosed - Output closed ports?

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        This is the thread entry point. It loops through the given range and test each port.
